name: Palm Kingdoms 2
description:
Palm Kingdoms 2 Deluxe is an old-school heroes-inspired strategy for Windows, Mac, iPad, and iPhone. Beautiful graphics and well-thought gameplay allow you to spend hours playing this game! You control knights, that gather resources, conquer castles and new lands, and fight your opponents.

The game has:
* 7 factions: Knight, Barbarian, Necromancer, Sorceress, Wizard, Warlock, Varangian.
* Hot-seat mode that allows several people to play using one computer.
* 180 creature types
* 114 artifacts
* Over 70 maps to play
